title: http.user\_agent
content:
`http.user_agent` String

The HTTP `User-Agent` request header, which contains a characteristic string to identify the client operating system and web browser.

<page>
---
title: ip.src Â· Cloudflare Ruleset Engine docs
description: The client TCP IP address, which may be adjusted to reflect the
  actual address of the client using HTTP headers such as `X-Forwarded-For` or
  `X-Real-IP`.
